BIPP.JK.summary: PT Bhuwanatala Indah Permai Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the development and management of commercial properties in Indonesia. The company develops and manages properties, including hotels, apartments, offices, shops, and housing properties. It is also involved in the equity participation business. The company was formerly known as PT Bandung Indah Plaza and changed its name to PT Bhuwanatala Indah Permai Tbk in 1990. PT Bhuwanatala Indah Permai Tbk was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bhuwanatala Indah Permai Tbk is a subsidiary of Safire Capital Pte. Ltd.

CPRI.JK.long_name: PT Capri Nusa Satu Properti Tbk
CPRI.JK.summary: PT Capri Nusa Satu Properti Tbk engages in the property and real estate development business in Indonesia. It develops resorts; and meeting houses and office buildings. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in East Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Capri Nusa Satu Properti Tbk is a subsidiary of PT RDW Global Investasi.

PAMG.JK.summary: PT Bima Sakti Pertiwi Tbk operates as a property developer in Riau. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Pekanbaru, Indonesia.

TARA.JK.summary: PT Sitara Propertindo Tbk primarily engages in the development of properties in Indonesia. The company constructs commercial and residential properties. PT Sitara Propertindo Tbk company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia.
